Text.Text: A hardy plant cultivated for its roots and leaves. The chicory root, once roasted, is used as a coffee substitute. Its leaves can be turned into natural fertilizer, enriching agricultural land.
These seeds can help you grow a few fields of chicory in alien soil.
These seeds can help you grow plentiful fields of chicory in alien soil.
These seeds have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with an increased yield of chicory.
These seeds have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with a maximum yield of chicory.
